title: Village Development Design Workshop Based on Papuan Regional Culture: Historical and Anthropological Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anthropology and regional development concepts, with experience in online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Practical project-based learning course for medical/legal/technical professionals, focusing on applying Papua's traditional governance systems and animist culture (Pakas Model) to modern village development

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the cultural context of the Papua region using historical and anthropological analysis methods
Learners can write a village development project design document based on the Pakas Animism Model
Learners can propose sustainable development plans reflecting cultural elements through small-group collaboration

resources: Real-time Video Conferencing Tools (Zoom, Miro, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
